languages.text: "Пока мы на Даргонусе, я сверяю отчеты секретарей и приглядываю за логистами. Господин Данрок справляется со своими обязанностями, однако приглядеть за ним не повредит".
"While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."
languages.original_text: "Пока мы на Даргонусе, я сверяю отчеты секретарей и приглядываю за логистами. Господин Данрок справляется со своими обязанностями, однако приглядеть за ним не повредит".

traits.locale_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but it won't hurt to keep an eye on him."
"While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but it won't hurt to keep an eye on him."
"While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

languages.text: “我们在达戈努斯逗留的这段期间，我会检查秘书们的报告，留意后勤人员的情况。丹罗克大师的工作做得很出色，但额外多留意一下会有助于改善他的表现。”
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: “我们在达戈努斯逗留的这段期间，我会检查秘书们的报告，留意后勤人员的情况。丹罗克大师的工作做得很出色，但额外多盯一眼也无伤大雅。”

languages.text: «Mientras estemos en Dargonus, quiero comprobar los informes del secretariado y echar un ojo a la logística. Aunque el maestro Danrok hace bien su trabajo, conviene vigilarlo ocasionalmente».
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras estemos en Dargonus, quiero comprobar los informes del secretariado y echar un ojo a la logística. Aunque el maestro Danrok hace bien su trabajo, conviene vigilarlo ocasionalmente».

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスでの滞在中、秘書官の報告書を確認して補給担当を監視いたします。マスター・ダンロックは職務をよくこなしていますが、少々の監視が大いに効果を発揮することでしょう」
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスでの滞在中、秘書官の報告書を確認して補給担当を監視いたします。マスター・ダンロックは職務をよくこなしていますが、少々の監視が大いに効果を発揮することでしょう」

languages.text: "Während wir auf Dargonus sind, werde ich die Berichte der Sekretäre prüfen und die Logistiker im Auge behalten. Meister Danrok leistet gute Arbeit, aber er neigt zu übermäßiger Genauigkeit."
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: "Während wir auf Dargonus sind, werde ich die Berichte der Sekretäre prüfen und die Logistiker im Auge behalten. Meister Danrok leistet gute Arbeit, aber es schadet nicht, auch ihn zu beobachten."

languages.text: « Pendant que nous sommes sur Dargonus, je vérifierai les rapports des secrétaires et garderai les logisticiens à l'œil. Maître Danrok fait bien son travail, mais une petite inspection ne fait jamais de mal. »
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant que nous sommes sur Dargonus, je vérifierai les rapports des secrétaires et garderai un œil sur les logisticiens. Maître Danrok fait bien son travail, mais une vérification ne fait jamais de mal. »

languages.text: "Hazır Dargonus'a gelmişken yazmanların raporlarını denetleyip lojistikçileri de gözetleyeceğim. Üstat Danrok işini iyi yapar yapmasına ama denetlemekten zarar gelmez."
languages.original_text: "While we're on Dargonus, I will check the secretaries' reports and keep an eye on the logisticians. Master Danrok does his job well, but a little scrutiny goes a long way with him."

traits.locale_text: "Hazır Dargonus'a gelmişken yazmanların raporlarını denetleyip lojistikçileri de gözetleyeceğim. Üstat Danrok işini iyi yapar yapmasına da, biraz denetlemekte fayda var."
